author: AP
title: Trump: 'We'll destroy his career'
text: Let friends in your social network know what you are reading about Facebook Email Trump: 'We'll destroy his career' President Donald Trump threatened to "destroy" the career of a Texas state senator in a meeting with sheriffs from around the country Tuesday.
